resources.string: Changed the color scheme of the system theme\n Added voice input for search\n Fixed bugs, improved stability

Added ‘Hide the grouping bar when scrolling‘ option
 Added ‘Font size‘ option
 Added date format YYYY.MM.DD
 Persian calendar added
 Support for animated AVIF images
 Support for Ultra HDR images (Android 14+)
 Support for wide-color-gamut images
 Copy to clipboard button for images
 Option to keep screen on while viewing media
 Ability to sort folders by item count
 Confirmation dialog when restoring media
 Fixed volume adjustment bug on some devices
 Fixed media picker showing only GIFs when both images and videos are requested
 Fixed metadata loss (EXIF) when editing or resizing images
 Fixed pixelation and artifacts in some JPEG XL images
 Fixed unresponsive image/video controls after rotating device
 Swipe-to-close gesture now works with WebP images
 Fixed inaccurate or broken seeking in some videos
 Image rotation edits no longer auto-save without confirmation
 External keyboards now work properly in copy/move dialogs

Added ‘Hide the grouping bar‘ option
 Added grouping button, you can disable it in the settings
 Added option to select text color for the widget
 Improved performance, bug fixes

Changed theme logic
 Improved app lock logic and user interface
 The mute logic has changed. Now muting an app does not affect the system, but system sound settings affect the app
 Added option to control video playback speed
 Added error indicator for media load failures
 Added initial support for JPEG XL format
 Added ‘Allow instantly changing media by clicking on screen sides’ option
 Added ‘App icon color’ option
 Added ‘Change the colour of the top bar when scrolling’ option
 Added options for bottom action buttons
 Improved scrolling performance and interface
 Improved performance, bug fixes
Fixed viewing of media files opened from other apps\n Improved performance, bug fixes
